data.eml:eml: A new Platocoelotes species and first description of the male of Platocoelotes icohamatoides from Hunan, China (Araneae: Amaurobiidae: Coelotinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Yin, Haiqiang, Xu, Xiang, Yan, Hengmei (2010): A new Platocoelotes species and first description of the male of Platocoelotes icohamatoides from Hunan, China (Araneae: Amaurobiidae: Coelotinae). Zootaxa 2399: 42-50, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.275875
